intent_atoms.description: Deliver a consolidated release readiness checklist and go-live runbook so QA, release engineering, and product stakeholders can execute ISOInspector releases consistently across CLI, notarized macOS DMG, and TestFlight builds.
Checklist enumerates QA gates with owners, commands, and evidence expectations.
Runbook instructions reuse distribution metadata, notarization tooling, and Tuist manifests from tasks E4 and F2.
Documentation updates and post-release bookkeeping steps (todo/workplan/prd trackers) appear explicitly.

functional_units.name: Release Readiness Checklist
functional_units.description: A consolidated checklist of QA gates, commands, owners, and evidence expectations for build, test, automation, and benchmark coverage.

functional_units.name: Documentation Synchronization
functional_units.description: Ensures release notes, README, manuals, and DocC archives stay in sync with the version bump.

functional_units.name: Packaging Runbook
functional_units.description: Outlines Tuist metadata updates, CLI binary builds, notarization flow, and TestFlight submission steps using shared distribution configuration and tooling.

functional_units.name: Go/No-Go Sign-Off Process
functional_units.description: Documents evidence required for release approval and captures deferred QA items such as macOS Combine benchmark follow-up.

functional_units.name: Runbook Command Execution Interface
functional_units.description: Provides commands to capture required actions for build, test, automation, and benchmark coverage.

functional_units.name: Documentation Update Workflow
functional_units.description: Workflow for updating documentation deliverables during a release.

functional_units.name: Post-Release Bookkeeping Steps
functional_units.description: Steps for tracking post-release tasks in todo/workplan/prd trackers.
